tidbits.title: Safari Destination
tidbits.description: Kenya is renowned for its diverse wildlife and is a popular safari destination, home to iconic species like lions, elephants, and giraffes.

tidbits.title: Natural Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country boasts stunning natural landscapes, from the savannas of Maasai Mara to the Great Rift Valley and Mount Kenya's peaks.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Kenya's cultural heritage includes rich traditions of various ethnic groups, vibrant music, dance, and craftsmanship like Maasai beadwork.
